languages.text: "И ты ведь знаешь, о чем речь... иначе бы не согласил{mf|ся|ась} изведать на себе ласку агонатора. В недрах боли ты находишь крупицы удовольствия, которым теперь я предлагаю тебе причаститься полностью". {n}Маражай тонко улыбается.{/n}

"You already know what I am talking about... otherwise, you would never have agreed to experience the agoniser's caress. In the depths of pain, you find morsels of pleasure, which I now invite you to partake of in full." {n}Marazhai smiles slightly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И ты ведь знаешь, о чем речь... иначе бы не согласил{mf|ся|ась} изведать на себе ласку агонатора. В недрах боли ты находишь крупицы удовольствия, которым теперь я предлагаю тебе причаститься полностью". {n}Маражай тонко улыбается.{/n}

"You already know what I am talking about... otherwise, you would never have agreed to experience the agoniser's caress. In the depths of pain, you find morsels of pleasure, which I now invite you to partake of in full." {n}Marazhai smiles slightly.{/n}

languages.text: “你早就明白我的意思……否则，你当初就不会接受折磨之鞭的爱抚。在痛苦的深渊之中，你会发觉点点滴滴的快感。现在，我邀请你尽情享受这种快感。”{n}玛拉斋微微一笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You already know what I am talking about... otherwise, you would never have agreed to experience the agoniser's caress. In the depths of pain, you find morsels of pleasure, which I now invite you to partake of in full." {n}Marazhai smiles slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你早就明白我的意思……否则，你当初就不会接受折磨之鞭的爱抚。在痛苦的深渊之中，你会发觉点点滴滴的快感。现在，我邀请你尽情享受这种快感。”{n}玛拉斋微微一笑。{/n}

languages.text: 「言葉の意味はもうわかっているはずだ…そうでなければ、アゴナイザーの愛撫を受けることに、決して頷かなかっただろう。深い痛みの中に、一筋の喜びを見つけられる。それを全身で受け止めてみるってことをおすすめしてやりたいのさ」{n}マラズハイはわずかに微笑んでみせる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You already know what I am talking about... otherwise, you would never have agreed to experience the agoniser's caress. In the depths of pain, you find morsels of pleasure, which I now invite you to partake of in full." {n}Marazhai smiles slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「言葉の意味はもうわかっているはずだ…そうでなければ、アゴナイザーの愛撫を受けることに、決して頷かなかっただろう。深い痛みの中に、一筋の喜びを見つけられる。それを全身で受け止めてみるってことをおすすめしてやりたいのさ」{n}マラズハイはわずかに微笑んでみせる。{/n}

languages.text: «Ya sabes a lo que me refiero... de lo contrario, nunca habrías aceptado probar la caricia del agonizador. En las profundidades del dolor encuentras bocaditos de placer y te invito a disfrutar plenamente de ellos». {n}Marazhai sonríe levemente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You already know what I am talking about... otherwise, you would never have agreed to experience the agoniser's caress. In the depths of pain, you find morsels of pleasure, which I now invite you to partake of in full." {n}Marazhai smiles slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ya sabes a lo que me refiero... de lo contrario, nunca habrías aceptado probar la caricia del agonizador. En las profundidades del dolor encuentras bocaditos de placer y te invito a disfrutar plenamente de ellos». {n}Marazhai sonríe levemente.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous savez déjà de quoi je parle... Autrement, vous n'auriez jamais accepté de vous soumettre à la caresse du neurocide. Dans les abîmes de la souffrance se cache une douce volupté que je vous invite à présent à savourer pleinement. » {n}Marazhai esquisse un sourire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You already know what I am talking about... otherwise, you would never have agreed to experience the agoniser's caress. In the depths of pain, you find morsels of pleasure, which I now invite you to partake of in full." {n}Marazhai smiles slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez déjà de quoi je parle... Autrement, vous n'auriez jamais accepté de vous soumettre à la caresse du neurocide. Dans les abîmes de la souffrance se cache une douce volupté que je vous invite à présent à savourer pleinement. » {n}Marazhai esquisse un sourire.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr wisst, wovon ich spreche ... sonst hättet Ihr doch nie zugestimmt, die Liebkosung eines Peinigers zu erleben. In den Tiefen des Schmerzes wartet kostbares Vergnügen und ich lade Euch dazu ein, es in vollen Zügen auszukosten." {n}Marazhai lächelt leicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You already know what I am talking about... otherwise, you would never have agreed to experience the agoniser's caress. In the depths of pain, you find morsels of pleasure, which I now invite you to partake of in full." {n}Marazhai smiles slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wisst, wovon ich spreche ... sonst hättet Ihr doch nie zugestimmt, die Liebkosung eines Peinigers zu erleben. In den Tiefen des Schmerzes wartet kostbares Vergnügen und ich lade Euch dazu ein, es in vollen Zügen auszukosten." {n}Marazhai lächelt leicht.{/n}

languages.text: "Neden bahsettiğimi zaten biliyorsun... Aksi hâlde kıvrandıranın dokunuşlarını deneyimlemeyi asla kabul etmezdin. Acının derinliklerinde ufacık zevkler keşfedersin. Bense seni bu tecrübeyi tepeden tırnağa yaşamaya çağırıyorum." {n}Marazhai hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You already know what I am talking about... otherwise, you would never have agreed to experience the agoniser's caress. In the depths of pain, you find morsels of pleasure, which I now invite you to partake of in full." {n}Marazhai smiles slightly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Neden bahsettiğimi zaten biliyorsun... Aksi hâlde kıvrandıranın dokunuşlarını deneyimlemeyi asla kabul etmezdin. Acının derinliklerinde ufacık zevkler keşfedersin. Bense seni bu tecrübeyi tepeden tırnağa yaşamaya çağırıyorum." {n}Marazhai, hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n}
